allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove jobs and crews features from website

- Delete jobs pages \(/jobs, /jobs/post\)
- Delete crews pages \(/crews, /crews/register\)

- Remove Post a Job CTA button from header
- Update Footer to remove Jobs & Crews section
- Update homepage to remove Jobs & Crews section
- Update about page to remove job board and crew network references
- Update Hero quick actions to show Residential and Materials instead

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
